metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Banchan 
• 
Ingredients: 
o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi 
• 
Instructions: 
o Prepare each side dish separately. 
o Arrange on small plates. 
o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.

Instructions: 
• 
In a food processor, combine dates, mixed nuts, dried fruit, and honey. 
• 
Process until the mixture comes together. 
• 
Press the mixture into a greased baking dish. 
• 
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before cutting into bars. 
• 
Store in an airtight container.

Hummus 
• 
Ingredients: 
o 1 can chickpeas 
o 1/4 cup tahini 
o 1/4 cup lemon juice 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
• 
Instructions: 
o Drain and rinse chickpeas. 
o Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. 
o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. 
o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

Falafel 
• 
Ingredients: 
o 1 can chickpeas 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup parsley 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon coriander 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/4 cup flour 
o Oil for frying 
• 
Instructions: 
o Drain and rinse chickpeas. 
o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander, 
and salt in a food processor. 
o Add flour and mix until combined. 
o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden. 

o Drain on paper towels and serve.
